languages.text: {n}Вам сложно понять, что именно разбилось — ясно только, что предмет упал на пол. При ближайшем рассмотрении осколки оказываются не совсем прозрачными, а скорее радужными — словно обмакнутыми в {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометий{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вам сложно понять, что именно разбилось — ясно только, что предмет упал на пол. При ближайшем рассмотрении осколки оказываются не совсем прозрачными, а скорее радужными — словно обмакнутыми в {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометий{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам сложно понять, что именно разбилось — ясно только, что предмет упал на пол. При ближайшем рассмотрении осколки оказываются не совсем прозрачными, а скорее радужными — словно обмакнутыми в {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометий{/g}.{/n}

Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

{n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

{n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

{n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

{n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很难说被打碎的东西究竟是什么。你唯一能确定的，就是那个东西掉在了地板上，摔碎了。仔细检查之后，你发现这些碎片并非完全透明，而是呈现出了彩虹般的色彩，就好像之前被浸泡在了{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}中一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很难说被打碎的东西究竟是什么。你唯一能确定的，就是那个东西掉在了地板上，摔碎了。仔细检查之后，你发现这些碎片并非完全透明，而是呈现出了彩虹般的色彩，就好像之前被浸泡在了{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}中一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es difícil saber qué se ha roto exactamente. El objeto ha caído al suelo, pero eso es todo lo que sabes. Al examinarlas más de cerca, las esquirlas parecen más iridiscentes que transparentes, como si hubieran estado sumergidas en {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es difícil saber qué se ha roto exactamente. El objeto ha caído al suelo, pero eso es todo lo que sabes. Al examinarlas más de cerca, las esquirlas parecen más iridiscentes que transparentes, como si hubieran estado sumergidas en {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}何が壊れていたのかをはっきりと言うのは難しい。物体が床に落ちたということだけは確かだ。よく調べてみると、破片は完全に透明ではなく、まるで{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}に浸されたかのように虹色に輝いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何が壊れていたのかをはっきりと言うのは難しい — 物体が床に落ちた、ということだけは確かな点です。よく調べてみると、破片は完全に透明ではなく、まるで{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}に浸されたかのようにイリディセントに輝いている。{/n}
{n}何が壊れていたのかをはっきりと言うのは難しい。物体が床に落ちたということだけは確かだ。よく調べてみると、破片は完全に透明ではなく、まるで{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}に浸されたかのように虹色に輝いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il est difficile de déterminer ce qui a été cassé. L'objet est tombé au sol, et c'est à peu près tout ce que vous pouvez en conclure. En regardant de plus près, vous constatez que les éclats paraissent irisés plutôt que transparents, comme s'ils avaient baigné dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il est difficile de déterminer ce qui a été cassé. L'objet est tombé au sol, et c'est à peu près tout ce que vous pouvez en conclure. En regardant de plus près, vous constatez que les éclats paraissent irisés plutôt que transparents, comme s'ils avaient baigné dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, was genau zerbrochen wurde – das Objekt ist auf den Boden gefallen, mehr kannst du nicht feststellen. Bei genauerer Betrachtung scheinen die Splitter eher zu schillern als komplett durchsichtig zu sein, als hätten sie in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} gelegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, was genau zerbrochen wurde – das Objekt ist auf den Boden gefallen, mehr kannst du nicht feststellen. Bei genauerer Betrachtung scheinen die Splitter eher zu schillern als komplett durchsichtig zu sein, als hätten sie in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} gelegen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Neyin kırıldığını kestirmek güç. Emin olabildiğin tek şey, yere bir nesnenin düşmüş olduğu, o kadar. Dikkatlice incelediğinde, parçaların tamamen şeffaf olmadığını fark ediyorsun. Yanardöner renkleri, {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyuma{/g} daldırılmış izlenimi yaratıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say what exactly was broken — the object fell on the floor, and that is as much as you can ascertain. Upon closer examination, the shards appear iridescent rather than completely transparent, as if they had been submerged in {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Neyin kırıldığını kestirmek güç. Emin olabildiğin tek şey, yere bir nesnenin düşmüş olduğu, o kadar. Dikkatlice incelediğinde, parçaların tamamen şeffaf olmadığını fark ediyorsun. Yanardöner renkleri, {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyum{/g}a daldırılmış izlenimi yaratıyor.{/n}
